author: John Bowden
title: Spain surpasses China with largest death toll from coronavirus
description: Spain has now surpassed China in the number of deaths the country has experienced from coronavirus as Spanish health officials struggle to prevent the virus from spreading further.A daily update to Spain's death to...
content:
Spain has now surpassed China in the number of deaths the country has experienced due to coronavirus as Spanish health officials struggle to stem the spread of the outbreak.
